scripts.pod:c:m1: rm -rf ios/Pods && rm -rf ios/Podfile.lock && yarn pod:install:m1
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && yarn install && rm -rf ios/Pods && rm -rf ios/Podfile.lock && yarn pod:i
scripts.clean:m1: rm -rf node_modules && yarn install && rm -rf ios/Pods && rm -rf ios/Podfile.lock && yarn pod:i:m1
scripts.clean:m1:pod: rm -rf node_modules && yarn install && rm -rf ios/Pods && yarn pod:i:m1
scripts.clean:m1:verbose: rm -rf node_modules && yarn install && rm -rf ios/Pods && rm -rf ios/Podfile.lock && yarn pod:i:m1:verbose
scripts.clean:lock: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf yarn.lock && yarn install && rm -rf ios/Pods && rm -rf ios/Podfile.lock && yarn pod:i
scripts.clean:lock:m1: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf yarn.lock && yarn install && rm -rf ios/Pods && rm -rf ios/Podfile.lock && yarn pod:i:m1
scripts.clean:lock:m1:verbose: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf yarn.lock && yarn install && rm -rf ios/Pods && rm -rf ios/Podfile.lock && yarn pod:i:m1:verbose
scripts.bundle:js:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
